C

create_samples_alliance(int) - Static method in class t_tests
To create two samples based on the alliance Sample-1 : all MPs from alliance other than UPA or NDA Sample-2 : all MPs from UPA or NDA
create_samples_avg(int, int) - Static method in class t_tests
To create two samples using the threshold as average value of col1 Sample-1 : points with value below the threshold value Sample-2 : points with value above the threshold value
create_samples_gender(int) - Static method in class t_tests
To create two samples based on the gender Sample-1 : all male MPs Sample-2 : all female MPs
create_samples_region(int) - Static method in class t_tests
To create two samples based on the region Sample-1 : MPs from South India Sample-2 : MPs from North India
create_samples_state(int) - Static method in class t_tests
To create two samples based on the size of the state Sample-1 : MPs from large states, i.e., states with more than 20 seats Sample-2 : MPs from small states

D

degree_of_freedom(double, double, int, int, double) - Static method in class t_tests
To calculate the degrees of freedom of t-value

S

To calculate the standard deviation of a given sample set
std_error(double, double, int, int) - Static method in class t_tests
